page.title: 13Cramlington:Open Spaces
page.content: Although Cramlington has large housing estates, there are adventure play parks, football fields, tennis courts, bowling greens, an athletics track, a BMX(bicycle moto-cross) track and an all weather pitch. There are farms on the outskirts of the town which are a mixture of arable and pasture. Cramlington also has a Garden Centre which has proved to be a very popular addition to the town. A large number of trees have been planted over the years and they are now starting to mature. On each housing estate trees and shrubs have been planted as a contrast to the building area. Arcot Hall Golf Club covers a large area with grassland, a pond, shrubs, and woodland. There are many pleasant walks through fields and parks. St.Peter's M.S.
